title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The response must use the numerical values 5 and 25.

As there is only one point for this part, any simplification errors will not earn the point, even in the presence of a correct answer.

We do not need to see the first line of the model solution. A correct tangent line will earn the point.

Even though we have defined the function g ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadEgaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3876@ in the stem of the problem, we will accept responses that replace g ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGNbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@3837@ in place of y in the tangent line equation. For example, g ( x )=25( x−2 )+5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadEgaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqpcaaI YaGaaGynamaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaaGaayjkai aawMcaaiabgUcaRiaaiwdaaaa@40E6@ earns the point.

All correct forms of the tangent line earn this point. For example:

· y−5=25( x−2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadMhacq GHsislcaaI1aGaeyypa0JaaGOmaiaaiwdadaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiE aiabgkHiTiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3CCD@

· y=5+25( x−2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadMhacq GH9aqpcaaI1aGaey4kaSIaaGOmaiaaiwdadaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiE aiabgkHiTiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3CC2@

· y=25x−50+5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadMhacq GH9aqpcaaIYaGaaGynaiaadIhacqGHsislcaaI1aGaaGimaiabgUca Riaaiwdaaaa@3BD7@

· y=25x−45 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadMhacq GH9aqpcaaIYaGaaGynaiaadIhacqGHsislcaaI0aGaaGynaaaa@3A3A@
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

Once you see a correct application of the product rule, the response has earned the point. If the response continues and makes an error in simplifying, the response will not earn the second (answer) point.

The first point is for an essentially correct application of the product rule. The point is earned only for a derivative that is one of the following:

· h ′  ( x )=g ( x )+x  g ′  ( x ); MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadIgapa GbauaapeGaaGjcVpaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa eyypa0Jaam4zaiaayIW7daqadaWdaeaapeGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawM caaiabgUcaRiaadIhacaaMe8Uabm4za8aagaqba8qacaaMi8+aaeWa a8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaGG7aaaaa@4842@ or

· h ′  ( x )=9+g ( x )+x  g ′  ( x ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadIgapa GbauaapeGaaGjcVpaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa eyypa0JaaGyoaiabgUcaRiaadEgacaaMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadI haaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGHRaWkcaWG4bGaaGjbVlqadEgapaGbauaa peGaaGjcVpaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiOlaa aa@49DA@

Note that the mistake with the derivative of the constant in the second example above will make the response ineligible for the second point.

To earn the answer point, we must see a numerical value equivalent to 55. Any arithmetic or algebraic errors in simplification will not earn the answer point, even in the presence of the correct answer.

A response of 5+2 ⋅ 25 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI1aGaey4kaSIaaGOmai aaysW7qaaaaaaaaaWdbiabgwSixlaaysW7caaIYaGaaGynaaaa@3C90@ is the minimal work required to earn both points.

Responses of just 5+50 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI1aGaey4kaSIaaGynai aaicdaaaa@364E@ or 55 would not earn either point because there is no supporting work.

Responses with some values of x plugged in, but not all, may still earn both points. For example, h ′  ( 2 )=g ( 2 )+x  g ′  ( 2 )=55 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadIgapa GbauaapeGaaGjcVpaabmaapaqaa8qacaaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGa eyypa0Jaam4zaiaayIW7daqadaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaawM caaiabgUcaRiaadIhacaaMe8Uabm4za8aagaqba8qacaaMi8+aaeWa a8aabaWdbiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH9aqpcaaI1aGaaGynaa aa@4944@ will earn both points.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

A response must demonstrate the Riemann sum in order to earn this point. This means we must see a sum of two products.

· This could be done with a response of just 49 ⋅ 0.2 + 81 ⋅ 0.2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaisdaca aI5aWdaiaaysW7peGaeyyXICTaaGjbVlaaicdacaGGUaGaaGOmaiaa bckacqGHRaWkcaqGGcGaaGioaiaaigdapaGaaGjbV=qacqGHflY1ca aMe8UaaGimaiaac6cacaaIYaaaaa@48D0@ or 0.2( 49+81 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaicdaca GGUaGaaGOmamaabmaapaqaa8qacaaI0aGaaGyoaiabgUcaRiaaiIda caaIXaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaiOlaaaa@3BB6@

· A response of just 9.8+16.2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaiMdaca GGUaGaaGioaiabgUcaRiaaigdacaaI2aGaaiOlaiaaikdaaaa@3956@ does not earn the point.

The answer must be presented numerically. Responses that stop with g ′  ( 2.2 ) ⋅ 0.2+ g ′  ( 2.4 ) ⋅ 0.2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga qbaiaayIW7daqadaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaiaac6cacaaIYaaacaGLOaGa ayzkaaWdaiaaysW7peGaeyyXICTaaGjbVlaaicdacaGGUaGaaGOmai abgUcaRiqadEgagaqbaiaayIW7daqadaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaiaac6ca caaI0aaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWdaiaaysW7peGaeyyXICTaaGjbVlaaic dacaGGUaGaaGOmaaaa@5043@ do not earn the point, as we need to see values pulled from the given table.

The answer does not need to be simplified to 26, but if the answer is simplified, this must be done correctly.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes the criteria below.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point requires a statement that is equivalent to “ g ′ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga qbaaaa@344C@ increasing,” but that is not simply a reference to concavity. This will require describing the behavior of g ′ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga qbaaaa@344C@ or g. For example, it will suffice to say, “the slopes of g are increasing,” to earn the first point. However, saying that “g is concave up” will not suffice by itself.

A response of just g ″ >0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga Gbaiabg6da+iaaicdaaaa@360E@ without a conclusion of how this is tied to g ′ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga qbaaaa@344C@ does not earn the first point.

Ambiguous statements will not earn the first point. For example, it is not sufficient to say, “the slopes are increasing,” as it is not clear which function is being referenced. References to “the graph” or “the curve” will also be viewed as ambiguous, as these terms have not been defined in the problem.

Ambiguous use of “the function” will be interpreted as the function g as this is the only “function” defined in the stem. If a response earns the first point and goes on to say something incorrect, the response will not earn the second point.

If the response earns the first point and goes on to say something irrelevant (but not incorrect), the response is still eligible to earn the second point.

Statements whose truth cannot be determined from the information given will also not earn the second point. There are a variety of these that you may see, such as “ g ″ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga Gbaaaa@344C@ is concave up” or “ g ′ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga qbaaaa@344C@ is concave up.”

It is not possible to earn the second point without earning the first point, even in the presence of the correct conclusion of “overestimate.”

Special case: If a response has used g ″ >0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga Gbaiabg6da+iaaicdaaaa@360E@ to incorrectly conclude that g ′ MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgaga qbaaaa@344C@ is decreasing on the interval, and then answers that the approximation is an underestimate, the response will earn one point.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

This point is earned only for a numerical answer. This answer does not need to be simplified, but any attempts at simplification must be correct.

The response must show at least the computation 5+26 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI1aGaey4kaSIaaGOmai aaiAdaaaa@3651@ to earn this point. An answer of just 31 would not earn the point.

The response will not be penalized for failing to use ≈. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHijYUcaGGUaaaaa@3597@

Responses are expected to use the approximation of the definite integral found in part (c). A response may do this even with an incorrect approximation found in part (c). A response may import an incorrect answer from part (c) and still earn the point in part (e).

The only acceptable answer in part (e) is the correct answer of 31 or an answer that is consistent with the approximation value found in part (c). (Note that when using an incorrect approximation, the minimal work required would be 5+(answer from part (c)). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI1aGaey4kaSIaaeikai aabggacaqGUbGaae4CaiaabEhacaqGLbGaaeOCaiaabccacaqGMbGa aeOCaiaab+gacaqGTbGaaeiiaiaabchacaqGHbGaaeOCaiaabshaca qGGaGaaeikaiaabogacaqGPaGaaeykaiaab6caaaa@4828@ )
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes the criteria below.

title: Part F
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is awarded for a response that provides clear evidence of an understanding of Euler’s method, presented in a table, or in the form shown in the model solution. This clear understanding would be demonstrated by no more than one error in the two steps in Euler’s method.

Responses that use g ′  ( 2.2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgapa GbauaapeGaaGjcVpaabmaapaqaa8qacaaIYaGaaiOlaiaaikdaaiaa wIcacaGLPaaaaaa@39CE@ in the first step and g ′  ( 2.4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgapa GbauaapeGaaGjcVpaabmaapaqaa8qacaaIYaGaaiOlaiaaisdaaiaa wIcacaGLPaaaaaa@39D0@ in the second step (rather than correctly using the values g ′  ( 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgapa GbauaapeGaaGjcVpaabmaapaqaa8qacaaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaa aa@3860@ and g ′  ( 2.2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiqadEgapa GbauaapeGaaGjcVpaabmaapaqaa8qacaaIYaGaaiOlaiaaikdaaiaa wIcacaGLPaaaaaa@39CE@ ), will earn the first point as long as there are no additional errors. These responses are ineligible for the second point.

The answer point is earned only by the correct answer.

The answer does not need to be simplified; 5+25 ⋅ 0.2+49 ⋅ 0.2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI1aGaey4kaSIaaGOmai aaiwdacaaMe8oeaaaaaaaaa8qacqGHflY1caaMe8UaaGimaiaac6ca caaIYaGaey4kaSIaaGinaiaaiMdapaGaaGjbV=qacqGHflY1caaMe8 UaaGimaiaac6cacaaIYaaaaa@480A@ would earn both points.

An answer of 19.8 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaGyoaiaac6caca aI4aaaaa@3626@ with no supporting work will earn no points. Similarly, an answer of only 10+9.8 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIXaGaaGimaiabgUcaRi aaiMdacaGGUaGaaGioaaaa@37C2@ is not sufficient to earn any points.

A tabular answer with or without labels will earn both points if all values are correct, even if the final answer is found only in the table (and not circled or boxed).

title: Part G
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The coefficients of the presented polynomial do not need to be simplified. (However, errors in simplification would mean the response does not earn the second point.) For example, if a response presents the second line of the model solution, the response has earned both points.

Only polynomials centered at x=2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadIhacq GH9aqpcaaIYaaaaa@3613@ are eligible for points in part (g). Polynomials centered about any value other than 2 will earn no points in this part (as only one term could be correct).

Responses with at least two terms correctly centered about x=2, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadIhacq GH9aqpcaaIYaGaaiilaaaa@36C3@ with numerical coefficients will earn the first point. Once earned, this point cannot be lost.

Including terms of degree greater than 3 or adding “ + … MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiabgUcaRi aaysW7cqGHMacVaaa@3751@ ” to the presented Taylor polynomial will not earn the second point.

Responses with terms multiplied out will still be eligible for both points, unless the response boxes the expanded polynomial, indicating that the polynomial about ( x−2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaadIhacqGHsi slcaaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@3763@ is not correct. For example,  5+25( x−2 )+ 100 2 ( x−2 ) 2 + 200 6 ( x−2 ) 3 =25x−45+50 ( x−2 ) 2 + 100 3 ( x−2 ) 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaacckaca aI1aGaey4kaSIaaGOmaiaaiwdadaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiEaiabgkHi TiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGHRaWkdaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymai aaicdacaaIWaaapaqaa8qacaaIYaaaamaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4bGa eyOeI0IaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaawMcaa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIYa aaaOGaey4kaSYaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaikdacaaIWaGaaGimaaWdaeaa peGaaGOnaaaadaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaaikdaaiaawI cacaGLPaaapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaG4maaaakiabg2da9iaaikda caaI1aGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaaisdacaaI1aGaey4kaSIaaGynaiaaic dadaqadaWdaeaapeGaamiEaiabgkHiTiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaa paWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRmaalaaapaqaa8qaca aIXaGaaGimaiaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaaiodaaaWaaeWaa8aabaWdbiaa dIhacqGHsislcaaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbi aaiodaaaaaaa@65F4@ earns both points, unless the right-hand side of the equation is circled or boxed.

Some responses choose to name the polynomial or equate it with our function g ( x ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadEgaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaGGUaaaaa@3928@ We will accept any naming of this polynomial, including g ( x ), MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadEgaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaGGSaaaaa@3926@ with one caveat. If the response gives it a name with an argument, the argument may not be a number. For example, responses with names such as g ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadEgaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3876@ or T 3  ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadsfapa WaaSbaaSqaa8qacaaIZaaapaqabaGccaaMi8+dbmaabmaapaqaa8qa caWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaa@3994@ or T are eligible for both points. However, responses that equate the polynomial with g ( 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadEgaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3835@ or T ( 2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadsfaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3821@ are ineligible for the second point.

Special case: A response with the first line of the model solution, g ( 2 )+ g ′  ( 2 )( x−2 )+ g ″ ( 2 ) 2! ( x−2 ) 2 + g ‴ ( 2 ) 3! ( x−2 ) 3 , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadEgaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGHRaWkceWG NbWdayaafaWdbiaayIW7daqadaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaawM caamaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaawMca aiabgUcaRmaalaaapaqaaiqadEgagaGba8qadaqadaWdaeaapeGaaG OmaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaiaacgcaaaWaaeWaa8aa baWdbiaadIhacqGHsislcaaIYaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWdamaaCaaale qabaWdbiaaikdaaaGccqGHRaWkdaWcaaWdaeaapeGabm4zayaasaWa aeWaa8aabaWdbiaaikdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaa8aabaWdbiaaiodaca GGHaaaamaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaa wMcaa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaOWdaiaacYcaaaa@59DA@ will earn one point. (Note: the response has presented a correct form of the Taylor polynomial for g ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadEgaca aMi8+aaeWaa8aabaWdbiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaa@3876@ centered at x=2. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaadIhacq GH9aqpcaaIYaGaaiOlaaaa@36C5@ ) Once this point has been earned, it cannot be lost. Any errors substituting numerical values or simplifying make the response ineligible to earn the second point.
